title: march 2: the world premiere of king kong
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the impact of the classic 1930s film King Kong. After, she remembers the strange journey of a hat that Pharrell Williams wore to the Grammys. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
